content: moulin is a classic beret designed to be worn as a chic topper to any ensemble twisted stitches adorn the uniquely textured brim while the elegant spiral crown and adorable i-cord loop add to the timeless feel of this charming accessory knit in our anti-pilling uptown worsted moulin is as soft and cozy as it is fashionable **skill** knitting **difficulty** easy **sizes** one size **finished measurements** brim unstretched 17¾ stretches to approx 22 height 9½ **materials** **universal yarn** *uptown worsted* 1 100% anti-pilling acrylic 100g/180 yds 375 antique rose 1 skein needle us size 8 5 mm 16 circular and set of dpns or your preferred needle for knitting small circumferences or size needed to obtain gauge us size 6 4 mm 16 circular notions stitch markers tapestry needle **gauge** 19 sts x 24 rnds = 4 in stockinette stitch st st with larger ndl after blocking save time check your gauge **pattern notes** this hat is knit in the round from the bottom up after working the brim stitches are increased for the hat body and then decreased for the crown the hat is finished with an i-cord loop on the crown the brim rib pattern is both written and charted for your convenience 1 https //universalyarn com/products/u-worsted
